title: Camp Olney
description:
Tim Kurkjian joins Buster to discuss tonight’s White Sox-A’s tilt and if Oakland can rundown Houston for the AL West, Fernando Tatis Jr.’s return, the Braves grabbing first place in the NL East, if the Mets are done, Chris Sale’s debut and the Red Sox sweep of the Orioles, the Yankees showing some grit taking a series from the White Sox, and Trevor Bauer getting his first day in court. Plus, interviews with Trea Turner and Dave Roberts.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Buster Olney
itunes:subtitle: LISTEN: Buster Olney is in the Adirondack Mountains talking to Tim Kurkjian about all of the MLB action over the weekend
